A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The longer I take time to think about this movie the more I become content with the overall movie. It wasn’t what I wanted but it might be just what this franchise needed\, something different. Although some of the plot lines had no payoff\, they brought consequence to characters’s actions\, not every decision made can always be a good one. The direction this movie took might be just what this franchise needed to have an impactful ending with complex characters finally bringing to an end the Skywalker storyline.
